wikipedia_page.main: Charles Leslie Dinsdale Fawcus (8 December 1898 – 8 December 1967), known as Leslie Fawcus, was an English school teacher, soldier and amateur cricketer who was Headmaster of Dunchurch-Winton Hall and played seven first-class cricket matches in the 1920s. Despite his short career, he made first-class appearances for Kent, Worcestershire and Oxford University as well as playing for Dorset in the Minor Counties Championship.
